main_topics: Common mistakes REALTORS make on Instagram

problems_addressed.specific_problem: REALTORS using boilerplate content that lacks personalization
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Focus on creating content that reflects personal interests and builds authentic connections.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Ineffective use of Instagram for active prospecting
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Implement a structured weekly engagement plan to actively connect with followers and local community members.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Cold calling feels intrusive and ineffective
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Use Instagram to build relationships digitally, reducing the need for cold calls.

target_avatars.key_takeaway: Adopt a structured Instagram engagement strategy to revitalize lead generation efforts.

episode_summary: In this episode, Michelle Berman Mikel shares her expertise on using Instagram as a powerful tool for real estate prospecting. She discusses common mistakes agents make, such as relying on boilerplate content, and offers a structured approach to active engagement. Listeners will learn how to build authentic connections and leverage Instagram to replace traditional cold calling methods.
